data.text: Yaa Waaqayyo jabina ko, ani sin jaalladha.
Waaqayyo kattaa koo, daʼannoo kootii fi oolchaa koo ti;
Ani Waaqayyo galanni isaaf malu sana nan waammadha;
Funyoon duʼaa na xaxe;
Funyoon siiʼool natti marame;
Ani dhiphina koo keessatti Waaqayyoon nan waammadhe;
Lafti ni hollatte; ni sochootes;
Aarri funyaan isaatii ol baʼe;
Inni samiiwwan tarsaasee gad buʼe;
Inni kiirubeelin yaabbatee barrise;
Inni dukkana haguuggii isaa, duumessa samii kan
Ifa fuula isaa keessaas duumessi dhagaa cabbiitii fi
Waaqayyo samiidhaa ni qaqawweessaʼe;
Inni xiyya isaa darbatee diinota bittinneesse;
Yaa Waaqayyo, dheekkamsa keetiin,
Inni ol gubbaadhaa gad hiixatee na qabe;
Inni diina koo isa jabaa jalaa, amajaajota koo
Isaan guyyaa rakkina kootti natti dhufan;
Inni iddoo balʼaatti na baase;
Waaqayyo akkuma qajeelummaa kootiitti naa kenneera;
Ani karaa Waaqayyoo eegeeraatii;
Seerri isaa hundinuu fuula koo dura jira;
Ani fuula isaa duratti mudaa hin qabu ture;
Waaqayyo akkuma qajeelumma kootti,
Ati nama amanamaatti amanamummaa kee argisiifta;
Nama qulqulluutti qulqulluu taata;
Ati warra gad of qaban ni oolchita;
Yaa Waaqayyo ati ibsaa koo jabeessitee ni ibsita;
Ani gargaarsa keetiin loltoota dhiibbadhee nan deema;
Waaqa kana karaan isaa mudaa hin qabu;
Waaqayyo malee Waaqni eenyu?
Kan humna na hidhachiisu,
Inni miilla koo akka miilla borofaa godha;
Inni harka koo waraanaaf leenjisa;
Ati gargaarsa kee kan nama fayyisu gaachana naaf goota;
Akka koomeen koo hin mucucaanneef,
Ani diinota koo ariʼee nan qaqqabadhe;
Ani akka isaan deebiʼanii kaʼuu hin dandeenyeef isaan nan barbadeesse;
Ati lolaaf humna na hidhachiifte;
Akka diinonni koo dugda duubatti deebiʼanii baqatan gooteerta;
Isaan gargaarsaaf iyyan; garuu kan isaan oolchu tokko iyyuu hin turre;
Anis akkuma awwaara bubbeen fudhatuutti isaan nan daake;
Ati lola namootaa jalaa na baafteerta;
Namoonni ormaa na sossobatan;
Isaan hundi abdii kutatan;
Waaqayyo jiraataa dha! Kattaan koo haa eebbifamu!
Inni Waaqa haaloo naa baasu,
diinota koo jalaas na baasa.
Kanaafuu yaa Waaqayyo, ani saboota gidduutti sin leellisa;
Inni moʼannaawwan gurguddaa mootii isaatiif ni kenna;
